articles.title: Leader of Japanese lay Buddhist group Soka Gakkai dies at 95 - Nikkei Asia
articles.description: Daisaku Ikeda was third president of influential organization
articles.content: TOKYO (Kyodo) -- Daisaku Ikeda, the longtime leader of the lay Buddhist organization Soka Gakkai, one of the largest religious groups in Japan, died of old age on Wednesday at his home in Tokyo, the … [+1165 chars]
